greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The Riordan square of the Motzkin numbers, triangle read by rows, T(n, k) for 0 <= k <= n.
maple: # The function RiordanSquare is defined in A321620.
mathematica: (* The function RiordanSquare is defined in A321620. *)
Motzkin = (1 - x - Sqrt[1 - 2 x - 3 x^2])/(2 x^2);
xref: T(n, 0) = A001006 (Motzkin), A111961 (row sums), A000007 (alternating row sums).
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Nov 22 2018
